item.title: Buttons and Calls to Action
item.description: Buttons Style Sample Default <a href="#" class="button">Button</a> Button Form Submit <input type="submit" class="button" value="Submit"> Heavy CTAs Style Sample Default <a href="#" class="button heavy-cta">Some action</a> Some action White <a href="#" class="button heavy-cta white">Some action</a> Some action Black <a href="#" class="button heavy-cta black">Some action</a> Some action Blue <a href="#" class="button heavy-cta blue">Some action</a> Some action Medium CTAs Style Sample Default <a href="#" class="button medium-cta">Some action</a> Some action White <a href="#" class="button medium-cta white">Some action</a> Some action Black <a href="#" class="button medium-cta black">Some action</a> Some action Blue <a href="#" class="button medium-cta blue">Some action</a> Some action Light CTAs Style Sample Default <a href="#" class="light-cta">Some action</a> Some action White <a href="#" class="light-cta white">Some action</a> Some action Black <a href="#" class="light-cta black">Some action</a> Some action
